w1.name: Phase
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aphelios''' switches between his {{as|main weapon}} and {{as|off-hand}} weapon over {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
w1.notes: * Switching does not interrupt '''any''' commands '''Aphelios''' was issued before or during ''Phase''.

e1.name: Weapon Queue System
description: The icon of this ability reflects the next weapon that is in reserve.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Aphelios''' receives a text prompt of the weapon '''Alune''' will create next.
e1.notes: * This ability also includes the icon of the {{as|off-hand}}.

r1.name: Moonlight Vigil
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aphelios''' casts forth a lunar spotlight that stops upon illuminating an enemy {{tip|champion|champion}}. '''Alune''' smites the [[area of effect|area]] centered on the illuminated enemy, dealing {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|125 to 225|6 to 16}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} and locking-on to each enemy hit.

After a brief delay, attacks will begin raining from the sky based on '''Aphelios' ''' current {{as|main weapon}}, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and applying [[on-hit effects]] upon each enemy locked-on by ''Moonlight Vigil''. These attacks can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|20|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. There is no {{sti|range}} limit for locked-on targets.
{{lc|{{ai|Calibrum|Aphelios}}}} Applies an empowered mark that deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|20 to 70|6 to 16}} {{as|'''additional''' physical damage}}}} per ''mark''.
{{lc|{{ai|Severum|Aphelios}}}} If at least one enemy is hit, '''Aphelios''' {{tip|heals}} for {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|200 to 400|6 to 16}}.
{{lc|{{ai|Gravitum|Aphelios}}}} The initial {{tip|slow}} is increased to 99%.
{{lc|{{ai|Infernum|Aphelios}}}} The initial blast deals an additional {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|50 to 150|6 to 16}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}}. Attacks {{tip|splash damage|splash}} in a 400 unit circle instead of a cone, dealing 75% of that damage. Enemies will take damage from overlapping areas.
{{lc|{{ai|Crescendum|Aphelios}}}} 3 additional spectral chakrams return to '''Aphelios''' from the first enemy hit, for a total of 4, on top of those from other enemies hit.
r1.notes:
* The basic attacks always count as {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} unless {{ai|Severum|Aphelios}} is being used. The lunar beam, however, may always be intercepted regardless of which weapon is in play as the main weapon.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks the ''Moonlight Vigil's'' initial detonation damage but does not prevent the attacks from locking-on.
* The basic attacks from ''Moonlight Vigil'' {{tip|critically strike}} independently from each other. Targets further away from the center of the blast are hit after a slightly longer delay. These attacks do not apply [[on-attack effects]].
*Changing weapons while ''Moonlight Vigil'' is in flight does not change the effect it has when it hits.
* ''Moonlight Vigil'' is always cast from the original casting position.
* With {{ai|Calibrum|Aphelios}}, the extra damage from consuming the mark is a bonus damage on top of ''Calibrum's '' normal mark consumption damage.
* With {{ai|Infernum|Aphelios}}, 14 fire bolts splash from each target hit (18 for {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}}). This does not occur if the initial damage of ''Moonlight Vigil'' [[kill]]s the target.
* With {{ai|Crescendum|Aphelios}}, 1 spectral chakram is gained for every target hit by the blast, meaning it is possible to gain up to 8 spectral chakrams with one use of ''Moonlight Vigil'' if it hits 5 enemy champions.
* With {{ai|Severum|Aphelios}}, the extra flat heal is given only once, not per target. However, all damage done by ''Moonlight Vigil'' with it also heals him from ''Severum's '' own passive effect.
* {{Pending for test}}: Locked-on attacks' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
